title: How the Dems' Inflation Act Is WEAPONIZING the IRS Against YOU!
description:
The "Inflation Reduction Act" won't reduce inflation, but it will increase your chances of getting audited. We dive deep into the Left's weaponization of the IRS with 87,000 new agents. Also, Palestinians are killing their own children, so no surprises there. And LwC takes a stand for commonsense car reform! #IRS #inflaton #inflationreductionact
